title: World's most Powerful Laptop.
description: Check out GeForce RTX 30 Series Laptops:  We tried to game at 8K on a laptop...  Our Cyberpunk 2077 gaming PC build!   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis !  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
